uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model

Class CSlotValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.CSlotValues

  • public class CSlotValues
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an ordered set of "fixed" concept-level values for specific slots on a particular frame, instantiations of which are required for all instantiations of those slots.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<IValue> getIValues(CIdentity slotId, IFrameFunction function)
      Provides a set of default instantiations of the fixed values for the specified slot.
      java.util.List<CIdentity> getSlotIdentities()
      Provides the set of identities for which fixed slot-values have been defined for slots attached to the frame.
      java.util.List<CValue<?>> getValues(CIdentity slotId)
      Provides the set of fixed values for the specified slot.
      <V extends CValue<?>>
      java.util.List<V>      		 getValues(CIdentity slotId, java.lang.Class<V> valueClass)
      Provides the set of fixed values for the specified slot, with the returned set being cast to a known type.
      boolean valueFor(CIdentity slotId)
      Checks whether there are fixed slot-values defined for the specified slot.
      boolean valuesDefined()
      Specifies whether any fixed slot-values have been defined for instantiations of any slots attached to the frame.

    • Method Detail

      • valuesDefined

        public boolean valuesDefined()
        Specifies whether any fixed slot-values have been defined for instantiations of any slots attached to the frame.
        Returns:
        True if any slot-values defined for frame

      • valueFor

        public boolean valueFor(CIdentity slotId)
        Checks whether there are fixed slot-values defined for the specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slot for which the existance of values is to be tested for
        Returns:
        True if fixed slot-values are defined for relevant slot

      • getSlotIdentities

        public java.util.List<CIdentity> getSlotIdentities()
        Provides the set of identities for which fixed slot-values have been defined for slots attached to the frame.
        Returns:
        Relevant set of identities

      • getValues

        public java.util.List<CValue<?>> getValues(CIdentity slotId)
        Provides the set of fixed values for the specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slot for which values are required
        Returns:
        Relevant set of values

      • getValues

        public <V extends CValue<?>> java.util.List<V> getValues(CIdentity slotId,
                                                         java.lang.Class<V> valueClass)
        Provides the set of fixed values for the specified slot, with the returned set being cast to a known type.
        Type Parameters:
        V - Generic version of valueClass
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slot for which values are required
        valueClass - Known class of values
        Returns:
        Relevant set of values

      • getIValues

        public java.util.List<IValue> getIValues(CIdentity slotId,
                                         IFrameFunction function)
        Provides a set of default instantiations of the fixed values for the specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slot for which default value-instantiations are required
        function - Required function of values (if applicable)
        Returns:
        Relevant set of default value-instantiations
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - if it is not possible to obtain default value-instantiations for any of the relevent fixed values
